name: Cogstellation
description:
Cogstellation is a space mining game based entirely around connecting gears. Improve your ship to be the space travel machine that you know it can be, and upgrade your base and equipment in an endless cycle until the solar system has been fully conquered, and beyond!

fight to the death and complete challenges to unlock the next planet, by doing so you will gain access to even better equipment, and a whole new base for your utilization with each planet.

once you are done with that, continue exploring the vast endless emptiness that awaits you beyond pluto's orbit, and see how far you can get.

join our discord community aswell to get help with the game and leave feedback.
